resources.string: Demonstration system for SOFWERX testing. It\'s not ready for operational use.
This device does not support battery optimization.
Can I turn off battery optimization for SqAN? This will allow for a more reliable mesh.
Squad Area Network (SqAN) is designed to provide an open source based mobile adhoc network (MANET) to a small dismounted maneuver unit or sensor network.
Do you want to shutdown SqAN and end all mesh connections?
SqAN needs location services to be enabled to support some network techniques and to help SqAN make decisions about mesh structure.
Shutdown SqAN completely to finish changing to the MANET engine.
Forget this device? This cannot be undone and will require you to reconnect to the device before the device is able to join you on SqAN. You can also chose to just not link to this device.
Bluetooth must be enabled to use the bluetooth portion of SqAN.
Without Bluetooth discovery, SqAN cannot find new bluetooth capable teammates.
Do this on your other devices too
This device will listen for %1$s for new teammates. You now need to do what you just did here (open teammate settings and then press Fix) on any other device you want to save as a teammate.
Shutdown SqAN completely to change the VPN status.
You do not have any teammates configured. SqAN will not be able to communicate until you identify teammates.
SqAN didn\'t find any new teammates. It seems like this scan may not have worked at all.
SqAN didn\'t find any new teammates. This device hasn\'t been rebooted in %1$s and some devices have bluetooth discovery problems when they have not been recently rebooted. Try rebooting this device.
